title: WATCH LIVE: Patriots vs Cowboys
text: 3RD & 2 on DAL 28 Penalty 7:07 B.Weeden sacked at DAL 21 for -7 yards (J.Collins). PENALTY on NE-J.Sheard, Defensive Holding, 5 yards, enforced at DAL 28 - No Play. 2ND & 5 on DAL 25 +3 YD 7:47 J.Randle right tackle to DAL 28 for 3 yards (D.Hightower). 1ST & 10 on DAL 20 +5 YD 8:19 B.Weeden pass short middle to J.Randle to DAL 25 for 5 yards (J.Collins) [J.Sheard]. S.Gostkowski kicks 65 yards from NE 35 to end zone, Touchback. Ball was caught on the back end line. Drive starting at 10:23 4TH & 10 on DAL 31 8:24 (Field Goal formation) S.Gostkowski 49 yard field goal is GOOD, Center-J.Cardona, Holder-R.Allen. 3RD & 12 on DAL 33 +2 YD 9:01 (Shotgun) T.Brady pass short middle to D.Amendola to DAL 31 for 2 yards (S.Lee). Pass complete on a "crossing pattern." 2ND & 17 on DAL 38 +5 YD 9:31 D.Lewis up the middle to DAL 33 for 5 yards (B.Church). 1ST & 10 on DAL 31 -7 YD 10:08 (No Huddle) T.Brady sacked at DAL 38 for -7 yards (G.Hardy). 1ST & 10 on DAL 45 +14 YD 10:23 (Shotgun) T.Brady pass short left to D.Lewis to DAL 31 for 14 yards (B.Church). Drive starting at 12:38 4TH & 12 on DAL 11 +84 YD 10:38 (Punt formation) C.Jones punts 59 yards to NE 30, Center-L.Ladouceur. D.Amendola to DAL 45 for 25 yards (L.Ladouceur; K.Wilber). 3RD & 3 on DAL 20 -9 YD 11:17 (Shotgun) B.Weeden sacked at DAL 11 for -9 yards (D.Hightower). 2ND & 5 on DAL 18 +2 YD 11:57 J.Randle up the middle to DAL 20 for 2 yards (D.Hightower). 1ST & 10 on DAL 13 +5 YD
